backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, settings, messages, and default strings with strict access-control checks for user and admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence associations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the Valentine experience UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens and global dark/light styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating start flow, ambient background, audio, timeline, flip cards, love meter, and final moment.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Ambien: Canvas animation of floating petals and hearts using a particle system with continuous motion and gradients.
frontend/src/components/valentine/AudioC: Audio player with gesture-based autoplay, mute toggle, and dynamic music source tied to customization store.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Canist: Provides login, logout, save, and load controls for syncing customization data with an Internet Identity canister.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Custom: A side panel for editing names, dates, messages, and music, including reset and cloud sync options.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FinalS: Handles the final proposal moment with buttons, fireworks, and a concluding romantic message sequence.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Firewo: Renders animated fireworks on a fullscreen canvas using particle effects.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Displays a footer with a love message and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/valentine/GlassC: A styled container component that applies a glass-card visual effect.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Landin: Intro screen with a heartbeat sound and transition before starting the main experience.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveMe: Animated love meter that fills to 100%, then breaks and triggers a confetti effect.
frontend/src/components/valentine/OurSto: Renders a customizable timeline with notes and optional photos, allowing users to edit text and upload images. Uses scroll-based reveal animations and state from the customization store.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reason: Displays 12 flip cards that reveal custom messages on click, with one special highlighted card. Messages are sourced from the customization store.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Secret: Provides an input form where users enter an anniversary date to unlock a hidden message. Validates multiple date formats and shows hints on incorrect entries.
Implements a tappable heart button that reveals a secret dialog after five taps. The dialog shows a message and embeds the SecretCodeUnlock component.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Calculates and displays a live countdown to the next Valentine's Day. Updates days, hours, minutes, and seconds every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes. Supports authenticated and anonymous actor creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterUserSettin: Loads and saves user customization settings to the backend canister, converting dates and parsing custom message formats. Syncs store values with backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient setup. Exposes identity state and status helpers to consumers.
Custom hook that syncs a React state value with localStorage, handling load and save with JSON parsing.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: A React hook using IntersectionObserver to track when an element becomes visible on scroll.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, and utility classes including glassmorphism and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/state/customizationDefaults: Defines the customization state shape and provides default romantic text, timeline entries, and media settings.
frontend/src/state/customizationStore.ts: Zustand store for user customization with setters, reset, and import/export of config, persisted to local storage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
